name: Comparison list
description: Displays a side-by-side comparison of exactly two items. This is ideal for comparing weather, game results, prices, or any two corresponding data points.
examples: Compare the weather in Seoul and Paris.
Compare the results of the baseball game.
Compare the calories of the food I ate yesterday.

component_title.description: A brief title for the entire comparison view (e.g., 'Weather Comparison', 'Game Results').

compare_list.description: An array containing exactly two items to be compared side-by-side.

title.description: The name of the item being compared (e.g., 'Seoul', 'Paris').

main_content.description: The primary value or data point for the comparison (e.g., '25°C', 'Sunny').

brief_info.description: Supplementary information for the item, such as a date or a brief note.
